roleset_name: impel through shame, assign shame as punishment

roles.descr_trans: 实体分配羞耻/通过羞耻推动

roleset_name_trans: 通过羞耻来推动，将羞耻作为惩罚

roleset_name: bring shame to another by acting shamefully oneself, causing shame

roles.descr: shameful actor/actions bringing shame to arg1
roles.descr_trans: 可耻的演员/行为给 arg1 带来耻辱
实体对 arg0 感到羞耻

roles.descr: shameful behavior/thing, if separate from arg0
roles.descr_trans: 可耻的行为/事情，如果与 arg0 分开

roleset_name_trans: 自己做出可耻的事，使他人蒙羞，造成耻辱
